name: Wierd: The Game: The Demo!
description:
As the title says, this is merely a chunk (1/5 to be accurate) of the real game, which got stuck in development. Since I didn't want  it to just die, so here it is, a peak of it.

Keyboard controls info:
   WASD or Arrow Keys + SpaceBar = Move;
   Z or RightShift = Action / Shooting;
   R = Restart level;
   P = Restart game to main menu;

Extra info: 
   Music, graphics, and development was made by me.

Good luck and have fun ;)
